attributes.action: Let people socialise in pubs and restaurants in all Tiers.
attributes.additional_details: Schools and people mixing in households is where transmission is rife. The hospitality sector has paid the heaviest price with the least amount of scientific evidence. The government has yet to produce cost based analysis on why destroying hospitality is essential to saving the NHS.
attributes.background: Allow people to socialise in pubs and restaurants in all Tiers. Pubs and restaurants have the most covid secure procedures of any businesses, transmission rates in hospitality is very low.
